divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: ON MARCH THE 26TH,1130AM,IT WAS A PARTLY CLOUDY DAY. AS MY WIFE AND DAUGHTER WHERE IN THE WAL-MART STORE,IN THE MALL OF ORANGE, I SAT OUT SIDE TO WAIT FOR THEM. I WAS LOOKING AS TO HOW BLUE AND HOW CLEAR THE CLOUDS LOOKED. THEN FROM THE ANAHEIM HILLS AREA OR FROM AN EASTERLY DIRECTION I COULD SEE A SHINY ROUND OBJECT COMING IN WEST,IT WAS METALIC AND MADE NO NOISE,I COULD NOT SEE IF IT HAD LIGHTS BECUSE IT WAS FAR AND VERY SHINEY. IT KEEPT MOVING WEST TILL I COULD NO LONGER SEE IT.I SAW IT FOR ABOUT 5 MINUTES.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around March 26th 2005
